ok_drinks.condition: Check out two drink ads on the streets of Chicago

best_thief.name: Best Thief EVER!

not_scary.name: Not So Scary

hello_there.name: Hello There
hello_there.description: Hello little guy, where are you from?

moment_clarity.name: A Moment of Clarity

lantern_souls.name: Lantern of the Fading Souls

big_monster.name: Big Monster

sweet_dream.name: Sweet Dream

please_be_quiet.name: Please, be quiet.

fatal_glitch.name: Fatal Glitch

sewer_monster.name: Sewer Monster

jelly_exhibition.name: Jellyfish at an Exhibition

frame_maid_mansion.name: You're a work of art!
